name: Ascension (itch) (Angry Lobster Games)
description:
Ascension is a small but surprisingly addictive game about you, a small, colourful rectangle, endlessly jumping up a construction site and collecting coins until, as we all do someday, you meet your demise.'

Encounter a problem? Copy the bug report and send it my way at robertsforrest25@gmail.com, or inbox me at angrylobstergames.tumblr.com
